tool_description: Use this API to pull relevant automobile data such as the car make, model, type, and year.

api_list.name: Cars
api_list.description: Retrieve and filter lists of cars based on various parameters.

required_parameters.name: page
required_parameters.description: The page number of the results to retrieve.

required_parameters.name: limit
required_parameters.description: The number of results to return per page.

optional_parameters.name: year
optional_parameters.description: The year the car was manufactured.

optional_parameters.name: model
optional_parameters.description: The specific model of the car.

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: The type of the car (e.g., SUV, Sedan).

api_list.name: Types
api_list.description: Get a list of supported car types.

api_list.name: Makes
api_list.description: Get a list of supported car makes.

api_list.name: Years
api_list.description: Get a list of supported car manufacturing years.
